name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 25, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced that airlines will no longer check nucleic acid test certificates before boarding flights to China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
It is said that the film "The Rescue" was shown at Peking University, and students gave negative comments after watching it. The film company put pressure on the school, causing the students to be forced to apologize to the crew.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On April 23, after the pre-download of "Honkai Impact 3rd", a new game produced by "Genshin Impact", miHoYo, was launched, many players in Guangdong reported that they received calls from the anti-fraud center, asking them to uninstall "Honkai Impact 3rd".
The reason is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
April 24, Nanjing Maigaoqiao
It was reported online that a suspect drove into a residential area in Nanjing Maigaoqiao, and the police dispatched a number of police cars to block the area. Some netizens said that a gunfight was suspected to have occurred at the scene.
In the video, a police car forced a white car to stop, and then the car accelerated and hit the road sign and street lamp, and then a man in black fled into the residential area.
Afterwards, a large number of police forces surrounded the residential area to arrest the suspect, which lasted until late at night.
On the afternoon of April 25, multiple departments in Nanjing Qixia District revealed that the police were dispatched to arrest the suspect, and there was no gunfight at the scene. "It was the suspect who drove the car and hit the street lamp." The police on duty at Nanjing Maigaoqiao Police Station said that a suspect ran into the residential area and the police went in to arrest him. "It is not convenient to disclose whether the person was finally caught, anyway, he is not there."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: So far, we have not received any videos that directly record the shooting process in the submissions from netizens. Most of them are text descriptions circulated on the Internet. Therefore, if any netizens have relevant videos, please add them. Thank you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Tonight, the official Weibo account of "The Rescue" released a statement saying that the atmosphere at the viewing event was good and that the problems described on the Internet did not occur. The film and its creators are very grateful for the students' analysis and cherish the opportunity to communicate with the audience. At the same time, they also hope that open discussions and analysis can be based on facts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A history teacher of an eighth-grade middle school posted a video on TikTok saying that content related to the epidemic has been included in the middle school textbooks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @zhangtruth1 Because Fang Zhouzi disclosed my personal information after blocking me, I cannot report him for opening my box. Reporting him by netizens seems to have no effect.
